name: iShares Core US Aggregate Bond ETF (Ondo Tokenized ETF)
description: AGGon is the Ondo Tokenized version of the iShares Core US Aggregate Bond ETF, giving tokenholders economic exposure similar to holding AGG and reinvesting any dividends. Ondo tokenized stocks enable non-US retail and institutional users around the world to instantly mint and redeem tokenized U.S. stocks and ETFs, 24 hours a day, five days a week with full access to traditional exchange liquidity. Additional restrictions apply. Learn more at ondo.finance/global-markets.
